DOC.brief_summary: This prospective, randomized phase II study is designed to evaluate weather neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy is superior to neoadjuvant chemotherapy with both followed by surgery and postoperative chemotherapy for locally advanced gastric adenocarcinoma.
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Phase II Trial of Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Compared With Chemoradiotherapy in Gastric Adenocarcinoma
